message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $15,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, and this is a competitive price.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $15,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I'm confident you'll find it's a fair offer considering the benefits this product will bring you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $11,000. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value.
